mapper.sql: ID, SUGGEST, AUDIT_TYPE, USER_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, STATUS, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, AUDIT_FIELD, AUDIT_CONTENT, AUDIT_FIELD_NAME ,IS_DELETED
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_AUDIT (ID, SUGGEST, AUDIT_TYPE, USER_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, STATUS, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, AUDIT_FIELD, AUDIT_FIELD_NAME ,IS_DELETED, AUDIT_CONTENT) values (#{id}, #{suggest}, #{auditType}, #{userId}, #{supplierId}, #{status}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditField}, #{auditFieldName} ,#{isDeleted}, #{auditContent})

insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_AUDIT
ID,
SUGGEST,
AUDIT_TYPE,
USER_ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,
STATUS,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,
AUDIT_FIELD,
AUDIT_CONTENT,
AUDIT_FIELD_NAME,
IS_DELETED,
#{id},
#{suggest},
#{auditType},
#{userId},
#{supplierId},
#{status},
#{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{auditField},
#{auditContent},
#{auditFieldName},
#{isDeleted},
select sys_guid() from dual

insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_AUDIT
ID,
SUGGEST,
AUDIT_TYPE,
USER_ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,
STATUS,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,

mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_AUDIT
SUGGEST = #{suggest},
AUDIT_TYPE = #{auditType},
USER_ID = #{userId},
STATUS = #{status},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AUDIT_FIELD = #{auditField},
AUDIT_CONTENT = #{auditContent},
AUDIT_FIELD_NAME = #{auditFieldName},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
where SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_AUDIT set SUGGEST = #{suggest}, AUDIT_TYPE = #{auditType}, USER_ID = #{userId}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId}, STATUS = #{status}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AUDIT_FIELD = #{auditField}, AUDIT_CONTENT = #{auditContent}, AUDIT_FIELD_NAME = #{auditFieldName}, IS_DELETED = # {isDeleted} where ID = #{id}
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_AUDIT set IS_DELETED = 1 where SUPPLIER_ID =#{supplierId}
